item.title: Health as an Investment
item.description:
“A healthy man wants a thousand things, a sick man only wants one.”

— Confucius

It’s often said that we all have a lof of problems, until we get sick - then we have only one.

Your body is the most important system you will ever maintain. Every goal you chase, every relationship you value, and every success you work toward depends on it. Without health, everything else fades into the background.

item.title: How Claude Code Works Under the Hood
item.description: A simple deep dive into how Claude Code works, how it scans your project, uses tools, and interacts with your codebase.

item.title: First Commit
item.description: Thoughts on engineering, entrepreneurship, and navigating the intersection of technology and life.

item.title: The Road to Wisdom
item.description:
The road to wisdom? Well, it’s plain
And simple to express:
Err
and err
and err again,
but less
and less
and less.

— Piet Hein
